greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators in the expansion of the exponential generating function ((1 + 3*x)/x)*(1 - (1 + 3*x)^(-2/3)).
comment: The rationals z(n) = a(n)/A038500(n+1) give the Sheffer z-sequence for the generalized unsigned Lah triangle L[3,1] = A290596. For Sheffer a- and z-sequences see a W. Lang link under A006232 with the references for the Riordan case, and also the present link for a proof.
link: Wolfdieter Lang, Note on a- and z-sequences of Sheffer number triangles for certain generalized Lah numbers.
formula: a(n) = numerator(r(n)) with the rationals r(n) = [x^n/n!] ((1 + 3*x)/x)*(1 - (1 + 3*x)^(-2/3)).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 13 2017
